name: canfar
tagline: Canadian Advanced Network for Astronomical Research
body:
The Canadian Advanced Network for Astronomical Research infrastructure you can build your data processing pipeline, interactively analyze results, and launch thousands of batch jobs on multiple clusters, using exactly the same operating system and software stack.

* Learn more about the CANFAR system

* Start with the tutorial

* Access your personal data

* Request an account
